pages.fallback: Custom Crafters can be upgraded into Forming Presss to process both smelting as well as crafting, such as brick crafting, charcoal creation, and lava generation.

The overall output of the Forming Press is approximately doubled compared to normal crafting operations.

The Forming Press does not remove functionality of a normal Custom Crafter, it simply adds recipes onto the Custom Crafter.
To create a Forming Press, the following recipe must be arranged in a Custom Crafter:
The following recipes can be used in a Forming Press:

with.text:
Any log type can be used,
as long as they are all the same
Netherrack and Nether Wart can swap slots
